## Hi there, I'm Angus üëã

I'm a first-year Computer Science student at the University of Edinburgh.

Thanks for stopping by and make sure to have a great day!

## What I'm working on üë®‚Äçüíª
- [ajhawkings/hawkings.me](https://github.com/ajhawkings/hawkings.me) - my personal website, built with [solid-start](https://github.com/solidjs/solid-start)
- Advent of Code 2024 in Haskell - coming soon

## Recent projects 
- [ajhawkings/conradmargoles](https://github.com/ajhawkings/conradmargoles) - A professional portfolio [website](conradmargoles.com) for a small London-based architectural firm using Next.js 
- [ajhawkings/squabble](https://github.com/ajhawkings/squabble) - A simple vanilla HTML/CSS/JS [website](squabble.hawkings.me) for a Young Enterprise project
- YearInfo - a school information system developed over 4 years - being open-sourced soon!
